body_html:
Okay after even more debugging I found out, that the line

model.AddGradientOperators([loss_g])

is the problem. AddGradientOperators can take any blob but loss_g to build Gradients.
Does not solve the problem so far...

body:
Okay after even more debugging I found out, that the line 

`model.AddGradientOperators([loss_g])`

is the problem. AddGradientOperators can take any blob but loss_g to build Gradients. 
Does not solve the problem so far...
